name: AlarmSeverityToIconPipe
description:
Pipe for transforming alarm severity types into corresponding icons.

Example :
Usage in an Angular template:
{{ 'CRITICAL' | AlarmSeverityToIcon }}
Result: 'exclamation-circle'
rawdescription:
Pipe for transforming alarm severity types into corresponding icons.

```html
Usage in an Angular template:
{{ 'CRITICAL' | AlarmSeverityToIcon }}
Result: 'exclamation-circle'
```

methods.name: transform
methods.rawdescription: Transforms an alarm severity type into a corresponding icon.
methods.description: Transforms an alarm severity type into a corresponding icon.

jsdoctags.comment: The corresponding icon for the given alarm severity type.
